reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: FCA CAR programme support and office

description.narrative: 1. Project: 11533 FCA CAR Programme support + office#2. Project area and Country: Central African Republic#3. Project justification: #CAR Country Programme remains focused on humanitarian work. MFAs support is fundamental for the presence of FCA in CAR and the achievement of the planned objectives. While we continue to respond to the humanitarian needs, peace work will continue and new activities aimed at strengthening womens livelihoods will also be initiated. FCA CAR works towards a constantly improved ac countable and efficient programme, contributing to fulling peoples rights to peace, quality education and livelihood.#4. The main objective and expected results:#The main objective is to improve effectiveness, quality, and impact of the Country Programme t hrough established field presence. This will be achieved through strategic and operational planning of the Country Programme, monitoring and evaluation of the country programme and implemented projects, dialogue with authorities and various local actors an d networking. Increased funding opportunities and effective coordination with other aid organisations will also contribute to the realisation of the established objectives. Projects are self-implemented and emphasis will be on the resourcing and staffing o f the Country Office. The management and administration of the Country Office will be strengthened and the safety and security of FCA staff ensured.#5. Right-holders/ beneficiaries: FCA Staff and local stakeholders#Duty bearers: FCA continues the collabora tion and capacity development of Ministry of Education and Ministry of Entrepreneurship.#6. Implementing partner: FCA CAR Country Office, together with relevant stakeholders
